toast.api-error.title: An error has occurred
api-error.invalid_request: Internal error: Invalid request. Please contact the administrator for more information.
api-error.not_found: Internal error: The resource is not found. Please contact the administrator for more information.
api-error.forbidden: You don't have the permission to access this resource.
api-error.internal_server_error: Internal error: A fatal problem has occurred. Please contact the administrator for more information.
api-error.invalid_response_from_provider: Internal error: Unknown result returned from the authentication provider
api-error.forbidden_live: You are currently not authorized to watch this live. It has not started yet or you maybe able to watch it by logging in if the streamer has set a privacy setting. Please try again a little later.
navbar.login.modal.title: Login
navbar.login.modal.welcome: Welcome to KnzkLive 👋 Which Fediverse account do you have?
navbar.login.modal.body: Log in with your {serverType} account. Enter the domain of the server (e.g. {placeholderDomain}).
navbar.login.modal.help: What data do we get from your {serverType} account?
navbar.login.modal.continue: Please continue to login in a new window...
page.about.title: About this website
page.about.description.1: This website is hosted by the platform feature from the live-streaming software, KnzkLive.
page.about.description.2: Information about the server hosting this website is listed below.
page.about.license: KnzkLive is open source software licensed under AGPL-3.0.
page.index.live-not-found: There are currently no lives available to the public
page.live.title: Live stream
create-live.title: Start a live
create-live.privacy.public: Public: Anyone can watch the live
create-live.privacy.private: Required login: Only logged-in users can watch the live
create-live.privacy.private.note: If login is required, the link to the live will be hidden from the top page
create-live.privacy.private.require-foll: You need to be following the watcher
Watcher needs to be a your follower
create-live.hashtag.note: 視聴者がコメントを ActivityPub へ同時に投稿したり、ActivityPub から投稿をコメントとして取得する機能を有効にする場合は入力してください。ハッシュタグは混乱を防ぐために他のユーザーやコミュニティが使用していないか確認してください。
create-live.sensitive.note: 有効にすると視聴者がページを開く際に警告が表示されます。この設定は配信中にも変更できます。
live.sensitive.title: This live is marked as sensitive
live.sensitive.description: Would you like to watch this live?: {title}
live.comment.title: Comment
live.comment-post.require-login: To post a comment, please sign in
live.comment-post.require-login.with-has: To post a comment, please sign in or post as publicly with #{hashtag}
live.comment-post.placeholder.with-hasht: Enter to post a comment (or post as publicly with #{hashtag})
live.comment-post.publish.popover.title: Publish to ActivityPub
live.comment-post.publish.popover.descri: If enabled, your comment will be posted as unlisted/home on your account {acct} with the hashtag #{hashtag}. Your comment will only be posted on KnzkLive if the streamer disables it or with this switch.
live.comment-post.permission-denied: Please re-login to KnzkLive with the same account because you do not have the required permission.
live.not-pushed: The streamer is not pushing the stream at this time.
live.player.settings.type.flv.title: Source quality
live.player.settings.type.hlsHq.title: High quality
live.player.settings.type.hlsLq.title: Low quality
live.player.settings.type.audio.title: Audio only
page.account-settings.title: Account settings
page.account-settings.profile.title: Profile
page.account-settings.profile.note: プロフィールは元のアカウントで変更した後、再ログインすると反映されます。
page.account-settings.tenant.title: Create a tenant (streamer account)
page.account-settings.tenant.note: 他の KnzkLive の配信者、もしくは管理者から招待コードを受け取る必要があります。
page.account-settings.invite.title: Invite codes
page.account-settings.invite.note: 招待コードを他のユーザーに渡すと KnzkLive で配信できるようになります。1ユーザー5個まで作成できます。
